# OIDC
Ci dessous les différentes requêtes pour récupérer des tokens
## Login
```shell
curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:8080/auth/realms/tindeer/protocol/openid-connect/token' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \
--data-urlencode 'username=toto' \
--data-urlencode 'password=toto' \
--data-urlencode 'grant_type=password' \
--data-urlencode 'client_id=tindeer' \
--data-urlencode 'client_secret=bIfRZiwY8D1vDTH5LKuzYLEcATWG87Rp'
```

## Userinfo
```shell
curl --location --request GET 'http://localhost:8080/auth/realms/tindeer/protocol/openid-connect/userinfo' \
--header "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICI4cURIWksxXzI5Ql9TNVk4UmpKVks4TVdzVHVYMllMYkY0cldwb250OTZjIn0..mLmTY-ZpM9G8tQzvtBDqqE5Tm4HKav3z-Nbx4c06WEZvJfGmIxhdXWh9H0_K8F3vfuEx305IT0-AJNmwRuUp5YHqgHvEV7m9CfzTRi6QnCdI0jVm841tEuOhJWLQM4tzTctFEadoglCh0cpSiv6wmhGsEQPHbQqQTuebPhOfCRH-i4Yr6TKlAwnH1htMVjPau02b-Ig3bkMjzyT7vZBlUb0YBXypNMcOEbR8JULBJkCOVtP19gNOf2S71iK9WlkmFHRWB2GzUjhBgNOqKMWUdVaO6lgwkkkMwuSWMc2R5g_kKXX4QYmRF6q8EvC2wKdQlzWredJWXqrplaixtHe3cQ"
```

## Token info
```shell
curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:8080/auth/realms/tindeer/protocol/openid-connect/token/introspect' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer XXXXXXXX' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \
--data-urlencode 'client_id=tindeer' \
--data-urlencode 'client_secret=76hzr7Ac7hRzFvJcdQZMi6uR7AJa0zsq' \
--data-urlencode 'token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICIwb1UwTnFDUVJIeW1QT0RVeF9IeTNrSlkxektvWm5WOUlMYjZYQzlhd1VjIn0..MxhouH1aOQcDPrLwsppe5wmOMKvzRt3WMM5x5Lld9ZqF3eG-n-PBYx0eumnD8VVlX_2vREQFpM2wH8UhPl2N3AgjlOVvuyGa3-MVwK-lIZ67PqMIBYKv_5HHHD4KmuV_JIWODWC4CctsBF2X6tUT-GxAS8qI0DMrRWGeRAI1OfBi3eaU9c_04ywsm0h8MqdUJHFmCgN-FUd5BMAxT9OWKS34LSnkwzx69RujWhd6PWT76JirUIaZVYlfaTjAgzvLpKZ-J0OCjTF9xBIQzoYSFMO4UVg7B9uNkXd9sgdjvP7hcKuEdBqFxMcC9n3swa44FIvDhypze2DHDCTiLzVLoA'
```
